Quickly generate string from estimates and p-values

Source: R/general_helpers.R
eststar.Rd

Quickly generate string from estimates and p-values

Usage

eststar(est, pvalue, digits = 2, na = "", ci.low = NA, ci.hi = NA)

Arguments

est

estimate

pvalue

p-value

digits

round to this number of decimals

na

return this if `est` is `NA`
